title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 78.38 - Storage, handling, use or transport of radioactive materials restricted
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 78.38 - Storage, handling, use or transport of radioactive materials restricted

State Regulations

No person shall store, keep, handle, use, dispense or
transport at, in or upon the airport any radioactive material without prior
permission of the airport operator. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
78.38

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
